'''Rainbow Cloud Flying Satin Pole''' is a creatable [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

The blueprint for Rainbow Cloud Flying Satin Pole is obtainable from the [[Realm Depot]] for {{Item|Realm Currency|24|x=160}}.

This item's blueprint was temporarily obtainable from the [[Fleeting Colors in Flight#Afterglow Market Stage 2|Afterglow Market Stage 2]] during the [[Fleeting Colors in Flight]] event in [[Version 2.4]], and was permanently added to the Realm Depot stock in [[Version 2.6]].

==Creation==
First time creation grants {{Item|Trust|24|x=60}}.
{{Recipe
|type = Creation
|time = 14h
|Sandbearer Wood = 4
|Fabric = 4
|Red Dye = 4
|sort = Sandbearer Wood;Fabric;Red Dye
}}
